title: Origami Lettering Christmas Card
content:
Hello I was happy to see a Christmas card where the letters were made by Japanese school children out of folded origami paper.  
A photo of the card (heavily photoshopped) was the basis for my own Christmas card.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821024112im_/http:/typophile.com/files/VladimirXmas2009_5666.jpg)

There are online instructions on how to construct such letters, although the card I saw followed other patterns. Origami paper is square, colored on one side and usually white on the other. Have fun!  
 [http://www.origami-club.com/en/abc/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821024112/http:/www.origami-club.com/en/abc/index.html "http://www.origami-club.com/en/abc/index.html")
author: Vladimir Tamari

comments.content:
Wow, pretty nice. lovely card.  
This site seems to be useful for starting learning alphabet letters.  
I'll enjoy this site with my nieces in New year's holidays.  
Merry Christmas!
